column4: so i am having a lovely problem with intrepid... it seems that i am having nvidia driver issues... i have reinstalled nvidia drivers version 177, but they still don't work.
should not have an issue with 177
right; I did a reisntall of the 177 drivers and reconfigured my xserver-xorg, but it says it can't load "type1" or the nvidia module
dont know man, i have a GTX260 and i cannot get it to run with 177 or the binary drivers
i am thinking maybe reconfigure xserver-xorg and then viewing my x configuration and making sure it looks okay, i guess?
im doing the same thing right now
i dont know how to do a reconfigure... its asking me questions about my keyboard i have no idea
haha, yeah, that's what xserver-xorg does
i just want to remove the bin drivers....
how do i remove the nvidia bin drivers?
i guess i'll try a bit of fussing and see what happens...
